summary:
I could not find any replacer or retexture for the greybeard robes, so i made my own;-)
Now the robes have 4K resolution and a lot of more details, like dragon runes, brown ornaments and a new belt buckle with dragon heads.
descriptionHtml:
I could not find any replacer or retexture for the greybeard robes, so i made my own;-)
V2 to is soo much better.
Have fun;-) 
Look at the screenshots.
New Videos will come soon.

[youtube]j-SG-yAoKO4[/youtube]

Thanks to dptheslothking for making this vid.
author: Nerevar
